name: Masterful Delivery
description:
This is a remake of a game I made over 4 years ago: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/406597611/

It was made in one day to test my ability to use the Godot game engine. It's not perfect, just like it's predecessor but I think me from 4 years ago would be proud. :)

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

To play you must approach the arrow box and click with your mouse to collect a burger. You then must find the corresponding table, approach it and click to earn money.
